SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT T1.MNG_MT ,T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ,T1.MNG_SEQ ,T1.ENTRPSCD ,T4.ENTRPS_NM ,T3.MNG_FEE_SJ ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.USAGE_AR,0),'999,990.00')) AS USAGE_AR ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.MNG_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS MNG_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.ELCTY_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS ELCTY_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.WATER_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS WATER_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.GAS_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS GAS_FEE ,'0' AS ENV_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.MNG_TOTAL_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS MNG_TOTAL_FEE ,SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,1,4) || '-' || SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,5,2) AS MNG_YR_MT ,(CASE WHEN T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE='M' THEN '[M]:마린센터' WHEN T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE='E' THEN '[E]:전기시설' ELSE '[' || T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE || ']:' || 'UNKNOWN' END) AS MNG_FEE_JOB_SE_NM ,SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,1,4) AS MNG_MT_YEAR ,SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,5,2) AS MNG_MT_MON ,T1.PRT_AT_CODE ,T1.CHRGE_KND ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM024',T1.CHRGE_KND) AS CHRGE_KND_NM ,T1.ACCNUT_YEAR ,T1.NTIC_NO ,TO_CHAR(T1.NTIC_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NTIC_DT ,TO_CHAR(T1.PAY_TMLMT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PAY_TMLMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS FEE ,T1.VAT_YN ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.VAT,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS VAT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.NTIC_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS NTIC_AMT ,T1.RCIV_SE ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM025',T1.RCIV_SE) AS RCIV_SE_NM ,TO_CHAR(T1.RCIV_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RCIV_DT ,T1.NHT_ISUE_YN ,T1.NHT_OUTPUT_YN ,T1.ADIT_NTIC_YN ,T1.ARRRG_NO ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(T1.ARRRG_AMT,'999,999,999,990')) AS ARRRG_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(T1.ARRRG_TARIFF,'0.000')) AS ARRRG_TARIFF ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(T1.ARRRG_PAY_DATES,'999,990')) AS ARRRG_PAY_DATES ,T1.RM FROM MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN FCLTS_MNG_FEE_DETAIL_F T2 ON (T1.MNG_MT=T2.MNG_MT AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE=T2.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE AND T1.MNG_SEQ=T2.MNG_SEQ) LEFT OUTER JOIN FCLTS_MNG_FEE_F T3 ON (T1.MNG_MT=T3.MNG_MT AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE=T3.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE) LEFT OUTER JOIN ENTRPS_INFO_F T4 ON (T1.ENTRPSCD=T4.ENTRPSCD) WHERE 1=1
AND T1.MNG_MT >= #sStartMngYear# || #sStartMngMt#
AND T1.MNG_MT >= #sStartMngYear# || '01'
AND T1.MNG_MT <= #sEndMngYear# || #sEndMngMt#
AND T1.MNG_MT <= #sEndMngYear# || '12'
AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #sMngFeeJobSe#
AND T1.ENTRPSCD = #sEntrpscd#
AND T1.NTIC_DT >= TO_DATE(#sStartNticDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND T1.NTIC_DT < TO_DATE(#sEndNticDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
AND T1.RCIV_SE = #sRcivSe#
AND T1.CHRGE_KND = #sChrgeKnd#
ORDER BY T1.MNG_MT,T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE,T1.NTIC_DT ) S ) A
WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT LTRIM(TO_CHAR(COUNT(*),'999,999,999,990')) AS DATA_COUNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(FEE),0),'999,999,999,990')) AS SUM_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(VAT),0),'999,999,999,990')) AS SUM_VAT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(NTIC_AMT),0),'999,999,999,990')) AS SUM_NTIC_AMT FROM MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F WHERE 1=1
AND MNG_MT >= #sStartMngYear# || #sStartMngMt#
AND MNG_MT >= #sStartMngYear# || '01'
AND MNG_MT <= #sEndMngYear# || #sEndMngMt#
AND MNG_MT <= #sEndMngYear# || '12'
AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #sMngFeeJobSe#
AND ENTRPSCD = #sEntrpscd#
AND NTIC_DT >= TO_DATE(#sStartNticDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND NTIC_DT < TO_DATE(#sEndNticDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
AND RCIV_SE = #sRcivSe#
AND CHRGE_KND = #sChrgeKnd#

SELECT /*+ INDEX (T2 PK_MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F) */ T1.MT ,NVL(SUM(T2.FEE),0) AS FEE ,NVL(SUM(T2.NTIC_AMT),0) AS NTIC_AMT FROM ( SELECT #entrpscd# AS ENTRPSCD ,#mngFeeJobSe# AS MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ,#mngMtYear# || LTRIM(TO_CHAR(LEVEL,'00')) AS MNG_MT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(LEVEL,'00')) AS MT ,TO_DATE(#mngMtYear# || '0101','YYYYMMDD') AS START_NTIC_DT ,TO_DATE(#mngMtYear# || '1231','YYYYMMDD') + 1 AS END_NTIC_DT FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 12 ) T1
LEFT OUTER JOIN MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F T2 ON (T1.MNG_MT=T2.MNG_MT AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE=T2.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE AND T1.ENTRPSCD=T2.ENTRPSCD AND T1.START_NTIC_DT<=T2.NTIC_DT AND T1.END_NTIC_DT>T2.NTIC_DT)
GROUP BY T1.MT ORDER BY T1.MT
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F T SET ( T.RCIV_SE ,T.RCIV_DT ) = ( SELECT NVL(MAX(RCVD_TP),T.RCIV_SE) ,NVL(MAX(RCVD_DT),T.RCIV_DT) FROM REV_COLL_F WHERE PRT_AT_CODE = T.PRT_AT_CODE AND WORK_CODE = T.CHRGE_KND AND FISCAL_YR = T.ACCNUT_YEAR AND BILL_NO = T.NTIC_NO ) WHERE PRT_AT_CODE = #prtAtCode# AND CHRGE_KND = #chrgeKnd# AND ACCNUT_YEAR = #accnutYear# AND NTIC_NO = #nticNo#
